Date First Available October 9, 2016

Price: $3.99 - $3.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:09:07 UTC – Details)


VIBRANT DESIGN: The bright and colorful Aim High Notepad brings a fun and happy touch to your daily school routine or goal-making list and is a delightful replacement to your typical stationery. 
WHAT’S INCLUDED: Every decorative notepad includes 50 pages that are perfect for teacher, parent, and student use. 
CREATIVE VERSATILITY: Carson Dellosa’s conveniently sized small notepads can be used for reminders, calendar notes, homework notes, and to set your everyday schedule. 
DIMENSIONS: Each fun and colorful notepad measures 5.75-inch by 6.25-inch. They are the ideal size for a quick note or a small sketch pad and make a personal addition to your themed classroom or your office space. 
DURABILITY: Each pad contains acid and lignin-free paper to ensure that each color stays vibrant and doesn’t become brittle with handling at home or in the classroom.
Inspirational Note Pads: Organize your daily and long-term notes, to-do list, and more with an inspirational daily planner notepad using Carson Dellosa’s Aim High Notepad.
What’s Included: The planner pad features 50 sheets of lined paper that say “MAKE IT HAPPEN!” with “Super Important”, “Then, Do This”, and “Chill, This Can Wait” to do list sections—perfect for teacher gifts or a daily to do notepad.
Notepad Dimensions: The to-do list notepad measures 5.75” x 6.25”—perfect for home office organization, classroom organization, a desk notepad, meeting notes, school supplies for college students, and other stationery needs.
Versatile Stationary Supplies: The pad of paper is great for office supplies, college supplies, classroom supplies, and work from home essentials. Use the note pad as a project organizer and homework organizer, create lists, write notes, and more.
Why Carson Dellosa: For more than 40 years, Carson Dellosa has provided solutions for parents and teachers to help their children get ahead and exceed learning goals. Carson Dellosa supports your child’s educational journey every step of the way.

The daily planner notepad features 3 organized sections to keep track of all of your short- and long-term to-do’s, including:

  • Super Important
  • Then, Do This
  • Chill, This Can Wait

Read more

STAY ORGANIZED FROM ANYWHERE

From the office or the classroom to your home, take your notepad on-the-go or style it on your desk with ease.

EVERYDAY ORGANIZATION

Features 50 sheets of lignin-free, acid free paper to track your notes, tasks, goals, to-lists, and more.

DESIGNS FOR EVERY STYLE AND SEASON

Make organization fun and festive with holiday and seasonal notepads, or incorporate designs that add to your favorite classroom theme!

Read more





Today’s Plan Notepad
Happy Place Teacher Planner
Celebrate Learning Teacher Planner
Substitute Folder for Elementary School Teacher
Decorative File Folders Set
I’ve Got This! Notepad
Overview 50 sheet lined paper to do list notepad for notes, lists, and checklist organizer 128-page, spiral-bound, undated daily, weekly, and monthly planner with 116 planner stickers Inspirational 128-page, spiral-bound, undated daily, weekly, and monthly planner with 46 planner stickers Substitute teacher folder with schedules, contact info, and classroom management Includes six 11.75” x 9.5” file folders Inspirational 50 sheet lined paper to do list notepad for notes, lists, sketch pad, and checklist organizer

【Premium Quality Beanie】: Beanie hats for women are made of high quality, stretchy, soft-spun acrylic and polyester, extremely soft, cozy and comfortable. Our winter hats for women will give you lasting warmth and softness in cold weather. Plus, you can pull the cuff of womens beanies for winter down to cover your ears for added warmth.
【Satin Lining & Cute Pom Pom】: Wearing our satin lined beanie to provided extra care for your head and ears! Special customized satin lined design makes this cute beanie very easy to wear and take off, and it won’t mess up your hairstyle. (as of Nov 30,2022 04:21:09 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About MANCYFIT

MANCYFIT strives to providing superior service to make you 100% satisfied, high-quality and comfortable clothing for your daily life.

What makes our products unique?

MANCYFIT is an international brand and clothing design company founded in 2016. The company was built in a passion for high-quality everyday wear with the goal of making life comfortable.

Inspired by life’s need, we strive to offer clothing in simple, everyday styles with a sense of versatile wearing in all seasons. We emphasizing every details carefully, and always striving to do better.

Thermal Set for Men

Thermal Top For Winter Warm

Soft Comfortable Thermal Pant

Thermal Set for Women

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 12.48 x 8.54 x 1.81 inches; 11.01 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 18, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08JCD7DY8

【ULTRA SOFT & WARM FABRIC】 Made of Polyester 95% + spandex 5% blend super skin-touch fabric, these base layer thermals for men are soft and comfy. The latest 4-way stretch material provides a breathable and comfortable fit.
【KEEP WARM IN NICE THICKNESS】 Perfect for cold weather, comfy stretch long johns in normal thickness is fleece lined, lightweight but warm, works excellently during your winter activities like snowboarding for added warmth and thermal insulation.
【TOP & BOTTOM INCLUDED】 Our mens long johns thermal set consists of a long sleeve top and a pair of full length pants with fly front opening, which are great to be wear as a set and also performs well as a single fleece top or a pair of basic leggings or tights.
【THERMALS FOR COLD WINTER】 Classic thermal long underwear must be your essential piece in this winter, a perfect basic layer under clothes to meet different fashion. Also can be an ultra-soft pajama set for cold winter nights.
【FAST SHIPPING & FLEXIBLE RETURN POLICY】 100% Product guarantee, add these Thermal Underwear for Men to your cart by clicking the “Add-to-cart” Button while you will own a 30-day, full-money-back warranty and can be returned or exchanged if you are unsatisfied on this item.

YOUR TEAM YOUR COLORS

From diving pairs to racing teams, Speedo team apparel can help you look like a cohesive unit. Show up to competitions with matching or coordinating team swimwear and apparel and you'll look and feel ready to show the other teams who's boss.

Fleece lined for extra warmth for those cold morning practices.

item.title: Thermal Underwear for Men, Ultra Soft Long Johns Set Fleece Lined Warm Base Layer Top and Bottom for Cold Weather
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Simple, classic, warm and comfortable. This is CL’s brand philosophy for designing men’s thermal clothing. We use high-quality materials, combined with exquisite craftsmanship, to create a new men’s basic base layers in 2022. Let men no longer fear the cold in winter, and let men enjoy the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:06:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Simple, classic, warm and comfortable. This is CL’s brand philosophy for designing men’s thermal clothing. We use high-quality materials, combined with exquisite craftsmanship, to create a new men’s basic base layers in 2022. Let men no longer fear the cold in winter, and let men enjoy the comfort and self-confidence of the whole day!

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.5 x 10.55 x 1.85 inches; 12.63 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 4, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08DR7SYF2

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
[All-Day Warm and Comfortable]: Our 2022 brand new upgraded Mens base layer set made of 90% Soft Polyester/ 10% Spandex blend super skin-touch fabric with high-end fleece lined, which gives a velvety feel against your skin, provides definitive comfort while keeping your whole body warm. It’s close-fitting like a second skin, so that you don’t have to deal with excess fabric bunching and gives you a lot more freedom to enjoy the outdoors. It’s the Best Thermal Clothing for Winter.
[Moisture-wicking & Odor-resistant]: Moisture wicking is important when selecting thermal underwear for men because the worst feeling in the cold winter weather is the clammy, cold sweat that happens, which leads to areas of your body feeling the cold more acutely. While our fleece thermal top and bottom set will wick away moisture fast and absorbing odor, keep you dry and warm and smart odor control. You will enjoy all-day comfortable and confident!
[Tagless & Pee Hole Design]: For even more added comfort, long johns for men thermal have no tags, which reduces any skin irritation; The thermal pants has a elastic waistband that helps to fit most men’s figures and are easily put on and taken off. And the humanized Fly Hole design is perfect for daily life. What’s more, the long underwear are reinforced with design details on the elastic collar at the neckline, cuffs and other joints to help you withstand the cold.

It’s time to embrace our hardy skivvies as a wardrobe must-have

From daily base layers to those worthier for at-home loafing, from athleisure to winter sports in the snow; No matter your reason for seeking out these cool-weather basics, our 2022 more advanced thermals that are resilient enough to keep things toasty during the most extreme of outdoor activities.

1. Soft & Comfort-The fabric is smooth and skin-friendly; Not easy to pilling, fade; 2. Tagless Design- Avoid to irritate your skin, soft and comfortable to wear; 3. Fleece Lined- Give you a velvety feel against your skin, keep you All-Day Warm; 4. Breathable- Wick away sweat fast and absorb odor;

Enjoy a full day of confidence and comfort!

WHY CHOOSE OUR THERMAL UNDERWEAR FOR MEN

  1. Upgraded 1: Fly/Pee Hole Design

    Pee Hole is Well Placed and Convenient

    Specially designed ergonomic fly/pee hold with two layers of lining for easy insulation, and more convenient and intimate in daily exercise.


  2. Upgraded 2: Fleece Lined

    24 Hours Keep You Warm In Cold Weather

    Our 2022 brand new upgraded Mens base layer set made of 90% Soft Polyester/ 10% Spandex blend super skin-touch fabric with high-end fleece lined, which gives a velvety feel against your skin, provides definitive comfort while keeping your whole body warm.


  3. Upgraded 3: 4 Way stretchy

    Offer Full Flexibility and Body Movement

    The high-stretch spandex fabric fits most men’s bodies and also provides support and stretch for movement, which can help you wear it comfortably all day long. Mens long johns provide all-way stretch and also support quick recovery for warmth and comfort.


  4. Upgraded 4: Exquisite Stictching

    4-Needles 6 Threads

    Neat and flat sutures, clear and meticulous routing. The well-made four-pin six-wire process, avoids friction between the clothing and the skin. At the same time prevents static electricity.


  5. Upgraded 5: Moisture-wicking & Odor-resistant

    Sweat Wicking & Quick Dry

    Our fleece thermal top and bottom set will wick away moisture fast and absorbing odor, keep you dry and warm and smart odor control. You will enjoy all-day comfortable and confident!


  6. Upgraded 6: Wide Elastic Waistband

    Resilient Band Helps To Fit Most Men’s Figures

    For added comfort, the elastic waistband stretches with your body while you move. Easily put on and taken off!


A pair of thermal top and bottom that does the job—stops winter in its tracks


These men thermal gear can be worn for traditional outdoor winter activities such as hunting, skiing, running, hiking and snowmobiling. Moreover, they can layer under your day-to-day clothes and will keep you warm when you’re working outside. As well as lounging around the house, or even as pajamas.

Next page

As A Gift for Father, Husband, Boyfriend and Sons. It Is Very Warm, Practical and Thoughtful!

ABOUT US

At Thermajane, we believe that keeping warm and cozy shouldn’t compromise style. We design our thermal underwear to give you the perfect solution to staying comfortable all season long.

Heat Retention: Thermajane womens thermal underwear keeps your body heat from escaping. They provide extra warmth and coziness to make a perfect everyday baselayer.
Ultra Soft: Our thermals for women are lined with fleece for extra softness against your skin. They’ll protect you from the cold for added comfort.
Moisture Wicking: While at home or at work, our womens long johns will keep you dry and odor free. No matter the activity, you’ll stay confident all day.

Embrace the great outdoors this winter with Thermajane womens long johns thermal sets. Suitable for all activities, this thermal set has ultra soft fleece and 4 way stretch. They can be worn under clothes as a baselayer for maximum warmth, comfort and mobility.

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 29,2022 00:05:24 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT US

At Thermajohn, we’re focused on keeping you warm and comfortable. Our thermals are the perfect winter clothing essential, so you keep the cold at bay. With various colors and styles, you will look and feel good all season long.

Thermajohn Thermal Collection

Thermajane Thermal Collection

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11 x 8 x 2 inches; 12.17 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ J-T-M-1836
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 29, 2017
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07JQ4BSFB

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Heat Retention: When it comes to warmth and everyday wear, these long johns for men is designed specifically for you to stay protected from the cold.
Ultra Soft Fleece: Designed with a fleece lining & quality material, these ultra soft mens thermal underwear set will keep you feeling comfortable throughout the day.
Moisture Wicking: Stay dry with these long underwear mens as they’re made from breathable fabric that effectively wicks away moisture and perspiration.

Thermajohn’s mens long underwear are crafted to meet the needs of every man. Our tops and bottoms are made from premium fabric radiating comfort and durability. With features such as moisture wicking and smart odor control, it is perfect for everyday wear.

Heat Retention

Our mens thermals are designed to retain heat and regulate your body temperature for all day comfort.

Ultra-Soft Fleece

Thermals for men are lined with fleece and made of high quality fabric that feels great on the skin.

Moisture Wicking

Our thermals are made with a breathable fabric that keeps you dry by wicking away moisture.

Read more

4-Way Stretch

Enjoy full mobility with our mens thermal underwear set that features a stretchable fabric.

Tagless

The tagless design and flatlock seams reduces chafing that causes discomfort for a better fit against your skin.

Fly/ Pee Hole

We designed our thermals with a built-in fly/pee-hole so you can answer nature’s call quickly.

Read more
